name: Key of Life
description:
## Key Of life Details

The key of life is the artifact looked at again, and discover'd there are still missing pieces. These pieces were scatter'd around the galaxy much like how the first three were, but randomly. most of them fell to the zerg and with the queen now neutralized, these pieces have become useless with the zerg. and will need these pieces for the full power of the artifact to stop an upcoming danger.

#### Episodes

Episode one: The key of life (zombie Survival with 3 boss triggers) (link: [http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/ep1-key-life/](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/ep1-key-life/>))

Episode two: They found us

Episode three: Relocate

Episode Four: The heat of battle

Episode five: a new mutation

Episode six: Incarnations

Episode seven: The cataclysm

###### note

*The first episode does not have many coding or events, other then bosses and waves. Second episode i am currently working on will be way better in interface and cut scenes. as i get to know more about the editor :p you will notice it right away when the next episode is released. *

thank you.
author: _ForgeUser6796310
